thread.section_title: MediaXpress Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MediaXpress | www.mediaxpress.net
thread.title: Tim Boudreau (Thomas Savage Books)
thread.title_full: MediaXpress reviewed by Tim Boudreau (Thomas Savage Books)

author: Tim Boudreau (Thomas Savage Books)
title: Tim Boudreau (Thomas Savage Books)
text: The orders I placed were just as expected, and when I was mistakenly overcharged for shipping by their automated system, they notified me directly and gave a prompt refund of the difference, without my having to go out of my way to request it. The csr was extremely helpful on the phone.
